WELCOME
Welcome To RANCHO TEXAS LANZAROTE PARK
WHERE ARE WE SITUATED? Calle Noruega s/n, Puerto Del Carmen
HOW DO I GET THERE? With our own Rancho Texas Bus service, taxi or your own car(see map)
ADMISSION PRICE INCLUDES: 3 spectacular animal shows: Birds of prey, parrot and sea lions. Lasso show Beautiful gardens with waterfalls and a variety of exotic birds and animals such as rare white tigers, pumas, buffalos and Nile crocodiles etc. Visit Liliput farm, the Indian tipees and lots more.
For a small additional cost: we have pony rides and canoeing. Visit our souvenir shop and fantastic Fast Food restaurant.
The Park is open daily 9:30 a 17:30 pm.
BUS SERVICE
